description: Inspired by an irresistible heavy-duty canvas fabric, the Fjällräven design team has created the pair of trousers that they’d like to live in themselves. Greenland Canvas Jeans are a timeless five-pocket model with articulated knees that give great freedom of movement despite their relatively narrow fit. The long-fibred cotton gives robustness and longevity – these are trousers that will just get better and better the more you wear them.
name: Fjallraven Greenland Canvas Jeans - Mens
